content: *oh-so-sweet kerchief and scarf with darling pocket and flower details patons yarns * materials patons® classic wool 100 g / 3 5 oz **kerchief and scarf** main color mc 00205 deep olive 3 balls contrast a 00206 russet 1 ball contrast b 00240 leaf green 1 ball *3 colors 5 balls total* *yardage given will make both kerchief and scarf * sizes 4 5 mm u s 7 and 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hooks or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 5½ shells and 8 row = 4 ins \ 10 cm with larger hook in pat written instructions are provided in pdf download march 2008 see also applique scarf 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/applique-scarf
